verification-kyb.desc-subtitle: Get your organization verified to issue credentials.
verification-kyb.desc-step1-subtitle: Send a company registration document such as a company certificate/equivalent along with your organization name.
verification-kyb.desc-step2-subtitle: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request.
verification-kyb.desc-step3-subtitle: An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
verification-kyb.upload-subtitle: Please upload your company registration document, like a certificate or equivalent.
verification-kyb.success-subtitle: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request. An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
